● WHO low-birth-weight feeding guidelines for LMIC (available at http://www.who.int/
maternal_child_adolescent/documents/infant_feeding_low_bw/en/)1 recommend ex -
clusive breast-milk feeding for all preterm and low-birth-weight infants.
● The GDG reviewed evidence for neonatal outcomes; the six-month duration is based on 
existing WHO recommendations and an updated Cochrane review.
Review question
In neonates (P), what is the effect of EBF (I) compared with predominant or partial
